name: UNICORN KNIGHT
description:
You are a (Super cool) Knight Who is also a Unicorn and you need to slay a dragon

Controls:

Left and right keys or A/D to move,

space to jump

Click to shoot lasers

Press 'E' over speakers or areas with a arrow over them to interact

This game is still very much in development and feedback is appreciated

font: https://www.dafont.com/milky-nice.font
